comment.author: 92033577@N00
comment._content: He certainly looks the part!! A Russian in diplomatic service. . . . en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Alexander_Konstantinovich_Benckendorff

comment.author: 76016463@N00
comment._content: Russian ambassador to England, 1903 to 1917.  English Wikipedia uses two f's at the end of his name, but the Russian is "Бенкендорф", with one f,  so I don't think LOC needs to change the transcription.

comment.author: 35234565@N04
comment._content: Thanks to all of you. The Library of Congress Authority File lists the spelling of the last name with two "f"s, so that's what we'll add to this caption the next time we update.
